}}

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:15.059
    | text      = This Johns Hopkins scenario relies on a template laid out by J. Ogilvy and Peter Schwartz in
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

    | timestamp = 00:14:25.539
    | text      = In this paper, Ogilvy and Schwartz try to help businesses and organizations understand
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:39.379

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:44.580
    | text      = The strategy of using a scenario matrix is explained in this paper.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:48.659

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:00.659

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
